title: Mahomes Mayhem Returns?
description:
The NFL Live Crew will recap the Steelers Vikings match up from Thursday Night Football. While further analyzing if Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs offense can get back to their explosive play vs the Las Vegas Raiders.
